name: Dragon Quest: Shounen Yangus to Fushigi no Dungeon
name_original: Dragon Quest: Shounen Yangus to Fushigi no Dungeon
description:
Dragon Quest: Shounen Yangus to Fushigi no Dungeon is an action game.
You can play Dragon Quest: Shounen Yangus to Fushigi no Dungeon on PlayStation 2.
It was scored by Hayato Matsuo and Koichi Sugiyama.
